description: This file declares the class CloudStoreImplementation which implements interfaces IStore2 and IConfiguration for managing configuration storage and retrieval in a cloud store context within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. It defines methods for registration, key/value operations, and configuration setup, and specifies a private pointer to an IStore2 instance.

classes.name: CloudStoreImplementation
classes.description: Implements cloud storage and configuration interfaces to handle key-value data and notifications

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Sets up the plugin with the provided service shell

methods.name: uint32_t Register(IStore2::INotification * notification)
methods.description: Registers a notification callback with the account store

methods.name: uint32_t Unregister(IStore2::INotification * notification)
methods.description: Unregisters a notification callback from the account store

methods.name: uint32_t SetValue(const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns,const string & key,const string & value,const uint32_t ttl)
methods.description: Sets a key-value pair within the specified namespace and scope

methods.name: uint32_t GetValue(const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns,const string & key,string & value,uint32_t & ttl)
methods.description: Retrieves a value and TTL for a specified key within a namespace and scope

methods.name: uint32_t DeleteKey(const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns,const string & key)
methods.description: Deletes a specific key within a namespace and scope

methods.name: uint32_t DeleteNamespace(const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns)
methods.description: Deletes an entire namespace within the scope

ctags.name: CloudStoreImplementation
ctags.pattern: /^    class CloudStoreImplementation : public Exchange::IStore2, public Exchange::IConfiguration {$/

ctags.name: DeleteKey
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t DeleteKey(const IStore2::ScopeType, const string& ns, const string& key) overri/

ctags.name: DeleteNamespace
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t DeleteNamespace(const IStore2::ScopeType, const string& ns) override$/

ctags.name: GetValue
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t GetValue(const IStore2::ScopeType, const string& ns, const string& key, string&/
ctags.signature: (const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns,const string & key,string & value,uint32_t & ttl)

ctags.name: SetValue
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t SetValue(const IStore2::ScopeType, const string& ns, const string& key, const s/
ctags.signature: (const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns,const string & key,const string & value,const uint32_t ttl)
